name: Party Pack
description: 100+ exclusive party prompts for epic game nights

prompts.text: Everyone switch seats! Last one standing takes a penalty
{player1}, you're the DJ for the next 10 minutes. Bad song = penalty
Group selfie time! Worst face wins, everyone else takes a penalty
{player1} and {player2}, thumb war! Loser takes a penalty
Everyone tell their most embarrassing autocorrect fail. Best story picks who takes a penalty
{player1}, do your best celebrity impression. Group votes - fail = penalty
Speed round! Everyone names a country starting with the same letter as their name. Repeats or hesitation = penalty
Truth bomb: {player1}, what's your toxic trait? Group decides if you're being honest
Everyone put your phones in the middle. First to grab theirs takes a double penalty
{player1}, tell a joke. If no one laughs, penalty. If everyone laughs, pick someone else to take one
Hot take round: Pineapple on pizza is... Everyone who disagrees with {player1} takes a penalty
Dance off! {player1} vs {player2}. Group votes, loser takes a penalty
Everyone close your eyes. Point to who you think is most likely to become famous. Most votes takes a penalty
{player1}, text the 5th person in your contacts 'I love you'. Show proof or penalty
Accent challenge! {player1} speaks in a British accent for the next 3 rounds or takes a penalty
Everyone share their screen time from today. Highest takes a penalty
{player1}, sing the chorus of the last song you listened to. Refuse = double penalty
Speed dating! {player1} has 30 seconds to convince {player2} to go on a fake date. Rejected = penalty
Two truths and a lie! {player1} goes. Anyone who guesses wrong takes a penalty
Rock paper scissors tournament! Last place takes a penalty
{player1}, what's your hot take about someone in this room? (Keep it fun!)
Everyone describe their ideal Sunday. Most boring answer (group vote) takes a penalty
{player1}, do 10 jumping jacks or take a penalty
Never have I ever... traveled alone. Everyone who has takes a penalty
{player1} picks a song. Everyone has to dance until it ends. First to stop takes a penalty
Roast battle! {player1} vs {player2}. Group picks the winner, loser takes a penalty
Everyone say something nice about the person on their left. Most generic compliment = penalty
{player1}, show your camera roll to {player2}. They pick your most embarrassing photo
Rapid fire! Name 5 things in {player1}'s fridge. Wrong = penalty
Everyone guess {player1}'s most played artist on Spotify. Closest wins, furthest takes a penalty
{player1}, prank call a friend. They have to believe you for 30 seconds or you take a penalty
Impression game! Everyone does their best {player1} impression. {player1} picks worst, they take a penalty
{player1}, what's the last lie you told? Group decides severity - white lie = 1 penalty, big lie = 3
Storytime! {player1} tells a story, others can call BS once. Wrong call = penalty
Everyone show their Uber rating. Lowest takes a penalty
{player1}, demonstrate your signature dance move. No move? Penalty!
Word association! Start with 'Party'. First to hesitate takes a penalty
{player1} and {player2}, staring contest! First to blink takes a penalty
Everyone share the last photo in your camera roll. Most interesting picks who takes a penalty
{player1}, call your mom and tell her you love her. On speaker. Voicemail = penalty
Trivia time! What year was {player1} born? Wrong answers take a penalty
Hot take: {player1}, name the most overrated movie. Anyone who disagrees = penalty
Everyone text 'hey' to their crush/partner. Last one to get a reply takes a penalty
{player1}, compliment everyone in the room in 30 seconds. Miss someone? Penalty!
Debate time! {player1} vs {player2} on cats vs dogs. Group votes, loser takes a penalty
Everyone share their most controversial food opinion. Worst take (voted) takes a penalty
{player1}, do your best TikTok dance. Group rates 1-10. Under 5 = penalty
Simon says... {player1} is Simon for 3 rounds. Anyone who messes up takes a penalty
{player1}, what's your guilty pleasure song? Sing the chorus or take a penalty
Everyone close your eyes. Point to the best dressed. Least votes takes a penalty
{player1}, do your best evil laugh. If anyone cringes, they take a penalty
Speed round! Everyone names their celebrity crush. Last to answer takes a penalty
{player1} and {player2}, compliment battle! Nicest compliment wins, other takes a penalty
Everyone share their most used emoji. Most basic (voted) takes a penalty
{player1}, freestyle rap for 20 seconds about this party. Stopping early = penalty
Truth time! {player1}, who in this room would you swap lives with?
Everyone describe {player1} in one word. {player1} picks their favorite, that person avoids a penalty
Charades! {player1} acts out a movie. First to guess picks who takes a penalty
{player1}, post an Instagram story tagging everyone here. No post = double penalty
Everyone share your go-to karaoke song. Then {player1} performs theirs!
High-low! {player1} shares their high and low of the week. Most relatable = no penalty
Everyone point to who gives the best hugs. That person picks who takes a penalty
{player1}, arm wrestle {player2}. Loser takes a penalty, winner picks someone for a bonus round
Hot take: {player1}, name the most overrated band. Defenders take a penalty
Memory game! Everyone lists what they're grateful for. Repeat someone else's = penalty
{player1}, what's your unpopular opinion about this friend group? (Keep it light!)
Everyone share their dream vacation. Most expensive (voted) takes a penalty
{player1}, do your best news anchor voice for 30 seconds on any topic
Everyone predict something about {player1}'s future. {player1} picks most likely, least likely takes a penalty
Pictionary! {player1} draws, first to guess wins immunity, last takes a penalty
{player1} and {player2}, hug for 10 awkward seconds. First to let go takes a penalty
Everyone say what they'd do with $1 million. Boring answer (voted) = penalty
{player1}, text your ex 'thinking of you'. Or take a triple penalty. Your choice!
Rate the party so far! Lowest rater takes a penalty (host excluded)
{player1}, give a 60-second TED talk on any topic. Too short = penalty
Everyone share their phone battery percentage. Lowest takes a penalty
{player1}, imitate how {player2} walks. If {player2} isn't offended, no penalty!
Truth time! Everyone share their biggest fear. Funniest (voted) takes a penalty
{player1}, you're a fortune teller. Predict something for {player2} - make it good!
Everyone list 3 things they like about {player1}. Best list (voted by {player1}) picks who takes a penalty
{player1}, what song describes your life right now? Play 30 seconds of it
Compliment train! Go around the circle. Break the chain = penalty
{player1} vs {player2}, who can hold a plank longer? Loser takes a penalty
Everyone share an embarrassing childhood story. Least embarrassing (voted) = penalty
{player1}, call someone not here and put them on speaker for 30 seconds
Hot take: Best fast food chain? Anyone who says McDonald's takes a penalty (or doesn't, your choice)
{player1}, speak in questions only for the next 2 rounds. Statement = penalty
Group photo challenge! Strike the same pose as {player1}. Worst recreation takes a penalty
{player1}, what would your dating profile say? Read it out loud!
Everyone share their biggest pet peeve. Anyone who's guilty of someone's pet peeve = penalty
{player1}, give {player2} a new nickname they have to use all night
Everyone stand up! Last one to high-five {player1} takes a penalty
{player1}, talk like you're in a movie trailer for 30 seconds
Secret ballot! Write down who's most likely to become president. Most votes takes a penalty
{player1}, share your screen and open your most recent Google search
Everyone share the last person they stalked on social media. No shame!
{player1}, pick someone to serenade. Song of their choice!
